code: import dayjs from"dayjs";import i18n from"i18n/i18n";import{TableIcons}from"utils/utils";import{Button,Tooltip,Space}from"antd";import Highlighter from"react-highlight-words";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const tableColumns=(onClickEditSpecialityForm,onClickRemoveSpeciality,highlightFilter)=>{return[{title:i18n.t("specialityList:nameSpeciality"),dataIndex:"nameSpeciality",key:"0",width:"35%",align:"left",render:(_text,record)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:highlightFilter?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Highlighter,{highlightStyle:{backgroundColor:"#f8d19b",padding:0},searchWords:[highlightFilter],autoEscape:true,textToHighlight:"".concat(record.nameSpeciality)}):"".concat(record.codeSpeciality," - ").concat(record.nameSpeciality)})},{title:i18n.t("specialityList:dateCreation"),dataIndex:"creationDate",key:"1",width:"35%",render:(_text,record)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:dayjs(record.creationDate).format("DD/MM/YY")})}),align:"left"},{title:"",dataIndex:"",key:"2",render:(_text,record)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Space,{size:"small",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:i18n.t("specialityList:EditionButton"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"primary",size:"middle",icon:TableIcons.getTableIcon(TableIcons.TableIcon.edit),onClick:()=>onClickEditSpecialityForm(record.idSpeciality,record.codeSpeciality.toString(),record.nameSpeciality)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:i18n.t("specialityList:DeletionButton"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"primary",icon:TableIcons.getTableIcon(TableIcons.TableIcon.trash),danger:true,onClick:()=>onClickRemoveSpeciality(record.idSpeciality,record.nameSpeciality)})})]})}),align:"center"}];};export default tableColumns;
